assertion.label: Change Details
assertion.name: change_details
assertion.value: A Correction to this paper has been published:

group.label: Research involving human participants and/or animals
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study does not contain human or animal studies by any of the authors. The data included here refer to human births identified in the DATASUS system. All human individuals had anonymized registers on the website. Resolution 466/12 of Brazilian legislation does not require approval by the Research Ethics Committee for data obtained from public databases of free access (National Health Council—Conselho Nacional de Saúde 2012, in Portuguese), as is the case with DATASUS.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

funder.name: Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior
